JACK.raw_line: But then...then I saw the moon. It was so big and it was so bright, and it seemed to chase the darkness away. And when it did...I wasn't scared anymore.Why I was there, and what I was meant to do - that I've never known. And a part of me wonders if I ever will.Hello. Hello. Good evening, ma'am. Ma'am?Oh, ah, excuse me, can you tell me where I am?Hello! Hello!My name is Jack Frost -- how do I know that? The moon told me so. But that was all he ever told me. And that was a long, long time ago. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 3.Ah, now that, that was fun. Hey wind...Take me home!Woooooohoooooooooo!SNOOOOOWWWW DAAAAYYYYYY!!!Huh, that looks interesting. Good book?You're welcome!Oh he's real alright. Real annoying, real grumpy, and really full of himself.Hey.Who's Jack Frost?Well, wasn't bigfoot kiddo.Free for all!Alright, who needs ammo?Look at that.Ooh, little slippery!Whoa, don't worry kid, I gotcha.Hold on. It's gonna be alright.Keep up with me kid! Take a left.Yeah!There you go!Whoa.Yeah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 23.Whoops.Oh, no...No!Ah, wait a minute! Come on, hold on, hold on! What about all that fun we just had? That wasn't the Tooth Fairy, that was me!What's a guy gotta do to get a little attention around here!If there's something I'm doing wrong, can you, can you just tell me what it is? Because I've tried everything, and no one ever sees me. You put me here, the least you can do is tell me, tell me why.Right on time, Sandman.Whoa!Bunny? You're not still mad about that...are yah?Hey!Put me down! What the...Ahhhhhhhhh!Wow, you gotta be kidding me.Hey, hey. Whoa, put me down.Oh, yeah. I love being shoved in a sack and tossed through a magic portal.Obviously.My, my what?Hey! Ho! Anyone wanna tell me why I'm here?That's not really helping. But thanks, little man. I musta done something really bad to get you four together.Am I on the naughty list?How come?What are you doing! Get, get that offa me!Huh?What makes you think I want to be a Guardian?No music! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 34.Look, this is all very flattering, but ah...you don't want me. You're all hard work and deadlines, and I'm snowballs and fun times. I'm not a Guardian.You mean the Boogeyman?All the more reason to pick someone more qualified!What?The Man in the Moon, he talks to you?But why, why wouldn't he tell me that himself? After 300 years this is his answer? To spend eternity like you guys cooped up in some, some hideout thinking of, of new ways to bribe kids? No no, that's not for me. No offense.Uhh, you ever hear of a snow day? I know it's no hard-boiled egg, but kids like what I do.No, the kangaroo's right.Oh. And this whole time I thought you were. If you're not a kangaroo, what are you?It's nothing personal, North. What you all do, it's just, it's not my thing.Slow down, wouldja? I've been trying to bust in here for years, I want a good look.Oh, don't worry, I never got past the yetis.Oh, hey Phil.Whoa! I always thought the elves made the toys.Ah, no, thanks.Tacks of brass?My center?You are downright jolly.There's a tiny wooden baby?You have big eyes?I don't know.North, North! I told you, I'm not going with you guys! There is no way I'm climbing into some rickety old......sleigh.Whoa! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 42.Okay, one ride, but that's it.WOOO-HOOOOOO!!!!!!Whoa!Hey, Bunny--Check out this view-- EEEYAAAAGGHGHH!Awww...you do care.They're taking the tooth fairies!Hey little Baby Tooth, you okay?Hyah!Aaaahhhh!We're not.What is?What's going on?I'm sorry, about the fairies.Why would Pitch take the teeth?What do you mean?My memories?But, I wasn't anyone before I was Jack Frost. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 53.What?That night at the pond...I just, why I assumed...Are you saying, are you saying I had a life before that? With a home? And a family?All these years, and the answers were right here. If I find my memories, then I'll know why I'm here. You have to show me.Then we have to get them back!I'm in.Hop to it rabbit, I'm five teeth ahead!Is that a challenge, cottontail?Ah, you okay?How long is a long time?Hmm...Yes!No!Kids, huh?It's a little different up close, huh?Yeah, well, look let's just get you taken care of. Then it's Pitch's turn, huh?You think I need help to beat a bunny? Check it out, Peter Cottontail.He can see us?But that's a um, that's a greyhound. Do you know what greyhounds do to rabbits?Whoops...Oh, I really wish I had a camera right now.Sandy, c'mon! We can find Pitch.Wahooo! Haha! Yes!Waaahahoooo!HAAAH! I got it!Sandy! Sandy, did you see that?!? Look at this thing!You made it my fight when you stole those teeth.Remind me not to get on your bad side.You take the ones on the left, I'll take the ones on the right?Aaaaaaaah!We gotta help Sandy!Noooo!No...NOOOOOO!!!! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 75.Ahhhhhh!!!!!I, I didn't know I could.I just, I wish I could've done something.But Sandy wo--But how can I know who I am, until I find out who I was?It's fear. He's tipped the balance.Sophie?Don't look at me, I'm invisible, remember? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 80.Blood and gums? When was the last time you guys actually hung out with kids?If one little kid can ruin Easter, then...we're in worse shape than I thought.Uh, how much time do we have?Not bad.Look, I'm sorry about that whole, you know, the "kangaroo" thing.How about I take her home?--no match for this.Trust me, I'll be quick as a bunny.We should get back. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 86.That voice, I know that voice...Don't worry, there's still time. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 87.Baby Tooth, Baby...come on! I have to find out what that is.Shhhh! keep it down. I'm gonna get you out of here, just as soon as I --As I can --Afraid?I'm not afraid of you!You think so, huh? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 89.Stop it! Stop it!You don't know what I am! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 91.What did you do?Baby Tooth!No.I was...it's... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 94.No, listen, listen...I'm sorry. I didn't mean for this to happen.What?You don't understand anything!In me?Pitch black...No, they'll fear both of us. And that's not what I want.Now for the last time, leave me alone.Baby Tooth!Alright, now let her go.No!Baby Tooth!You alright?Sorry, all I can do is keep you cold.Pitch was right - I make a mess of everything.Hey?We will.It's okay. It's okay. Don't look down, just look at me.I know, I know...but you're gonna be alright. You're not gonna fall in. We're gonna have a little fun instead.Would I trick you?Well, alright. Well, not, not this time. I promise. I promise, you're gonna be...you're gonna be fine.You have to believe in me.You wanna play a game? We're going to play Hopscotch! Like we play every day!It's as easy as...one...whoaaaa...Two... Three!Alright...Now it's your turn.One...That's it, that's it...two...Three.Whoa...Did you -- did you see that?It -- it was me! I had a family! I had a sister!I saved her!That's why you chose me. I'm, I'm a Guardian.We have to get out of here.Come on Baby Tooth! I owe you one.Come on, let's go.What's wrong?!None of you can fly?The lights... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 106.They're all going out...Jamie!Did he just say--?He said it again. He said -- You said...That's right! But-but that's me! Jack Frost! That's my name! You said my name!Wait, can you hear me? Can you... Can you see me? He sees me. He sees me!I know!I know!Yeah! Who do you think brings you all the blizzards and snow days, and you remember when you went flying on that sled the other day?!That was me!Right?!Real-real-real! Every one of us is real!You okay?Same as you.Wait, but, where's Bunny?Oh...no...Get Jamie out of here.He's stronger. I can't beat him.I know, I know. But you're gonna be alright...We're gonnna have a little fun, instead. That's it. That's my center.Now let's go get your friends.Yeah! Come on!They're just bad dreams, Jamie.Thanks, Tooth!It's over Pitch! There's no place to hide.Sandy.Yeah!It took awhile, but I figured it out.Looks like it's your fear they smell. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 130.I will.Hey, hey, slow down, slow down. You telling me you stop believing in the moon when the sun comes up? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 134.Okay, well do you stop believing in the sun when clouds block it out?We'll always be there, Jamie. And now...we'll always be here. Which kind of makes you a Guardian too.My name is Jack Frost. And I'm a Guardian. How do I know that? Because the moon told me so. And when the moon tells you something, believe it.

NORTH.raw_line: Still waiting for cookies!Yes!Ah, finally!Ach!How many times have I told you to knock?What...? The Globe?Shoo with your pointy heads. Why are you always under boot?What is this?Have you checked the axis? Is rotation balanced?Can it be? Dingle!Make preparations! We are going to have company.My fellow Guardians - It is our job to watch over the children of the world, and keep them safe - to bring wonder, hope and dreams. And so, I've called us all here for one reason, and one reason only - the children are in danger.An enemy we have kept at bay for centuries has finally decided to strike back. We alone can stop him.Cookies? Eggnog, anyone?Sandy, thank you for coming.I know, I know, but I obviously wouldn't have called you all here unless it was serious.The Boogie Man was here - at the Pole.Yes! There was black sand covering the globe.And then a shadow!Well, ah, not exactly... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 10.Look, he is up to something very bad. I feel it, in my belly.Please. Bunny. Easter is not Christmas.No matter how much you paint, is still egg! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 11.Why are rabbits always so nervous.Tooth! Can't you see we're trying to argue.I know it was him. We have serious situation!Aah! Man in Moon! Sandy, why didn't you say something?It's been a long time old friend! What is big news?Manny...what must we do? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 13.He's choosing a new Guardian.Must be big deal! Manny thinks we need help!Jack Frost.Guardian.He's here.Quiet.Hey, there he is! Jack Frost!I hope the yetis treated you well?Oh, good! That was my idea! You know Bunny, obviously.And the Tooth Fairy?And Sandman. Sandy! Sandy! Wake up!On naughty list? You hold record! But no matter. We overlook. Now we are wiping clean the slate.How come? I tell you how come! Because now...you are Guardian! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 33.This is the best part!Of course you do! Music!A child who believes. And good or bad, naughty or nice, we protect them. Tooth...fingers out of mouth.Okay, no more wishy-washy! Pitch is out there doing who knows what!Yes! When Pitch threatens us, he threatens them as well. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 35.Pick? You think we pick? No, you were chosen like we were all chosen. By Man in Moon.You see, you can not say no. It is destiny.Jack. Walk with me.Man in Moon says it is your thing. We will see!What do you mean, "bust in?"Keep up, Jack! Keep up!We just let them believe that.Very nice! Keep up good work!I don't like it. Paint it red.Step it up, everybody.Fruit cake?Now we get down to tacks of brass!Who are you, Jack Frost? What is your center?If Man in Moon chose you to be a Guardian, you must have something very special inside.Hmmmm?Here. This is how you see me, no? Very big, intimidating. But if you get to know me a little-- Well, go on.Ah, but not just jolly... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 40.I am also mysterious. And fearless. And caring. And at my center...Look closer. What do you see?Yes! Big eyes. Very big. Because they are full! Of wonder! That is my center. It is what I was born with. Eyes that have always seen the wonder in everything!Eyes that see lights in the trees, and magic in the air!This wonder is what I put into the world, and what I protect in children. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 41.It is what makes me a Guardian. It is my center. What is yours?Boys, ship shape. As soon as impossible.Hey! Moi deti, moi deti. Quiet, quiet.Everyone loves the sleigh.Bunny, what are you waiting for?Ah, get in. Buckle up!That was just expression!Are we ready?Good! Let's go! Clear! Hyah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 43.Out of the way!Hyah!I hope you like the loopty loops!Here we go!Klasno! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 44.Hold on everyone, I know a shortcut.I say, Tooth Palace.Hyah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 45.What!?What are they!?Here, take over!Yah!Jack, look out!Tooth! Are you alright?Why are you doing this?He's gone.This is one time I wish I was wrong. But he will pay. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 52.You should've seen Bunny.No! No! No such thing as too late! Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Idea!! HAHH!!We will collect the teeth!We get teeth! Children keep believing in you!Give me break! You know how many toys I deliver in one night?And Jack, if you help us, we will get you your memories.Quickly! Quickly!A race? Is it a race??This is going to be...EPIC!!Is piece of pie!That's my tooth! Sandy! Sandy!Ahh! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 60.Here you are!Oh, what gives slowpokes!?How you feeling, Toothy?Haha! That's what I want to hear.SSSHHHHHHHHH!!!Gentlemen! Gentlemen! This is about Tooth. It's not a competition! But if it was -- I win. YEEEEEHAAAHH!Oh no...Sandy, Sandy!Ah!Candy canes...Whuh-huh...?Ah!Ha. Ha. Ha. Come on!Hyah!Jack!Hurry, hurry!Sandy...Jack! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 76.Are you alright?Done something? Jack, you stood up to Pitch. You saved us.(putting his hand onI don't know who you were in your past life, but in this life you are Guardian.You will. I feel it, in my belly.Bunny is right. As much as it pains me to say old friend, this time Easter is more important than Christmas!We must hurry to the Warren. Everyone, to the sleigh!Shostakovich!"Buckle up." Is very funny.Ah, snow globe.We are very busy bringing joy to children! We don't have time... ...for children.Rimsky Korsakov! That's a lot of eggs.Single file!Okay, that's little strange.Jack, where were you?The Nightmares attacked the tunnels. They smashed every egg, crushed every basket. Nothing made it to the surface.That is why you weren't here?You were with Pitch?Whoa, whoa, whoa...Ah, moi deti! Come back!Is official. My powers are kaput.What are you doing here?The last light!Jack! He sees you!Losing Easter took its toll on all of us. Bunny most of all.Be careful, Jack!That was good try, Jack! A for effort!Merry Christmas!Hyah! Wrong roof.Welcome back, old friend!Your center?You're all on naughty list. Bunny, think fast!Leaving the party so soon?So what? As long as one child believes, we will be here to fight fear!They can't be my Nightmares, I'm not afraid.Are you ready now, Jack? To make it official.Then is time you take Oath. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 131."Will you, Jack Frost...vow to watch over the children of the world?To guard them with your life - their hopes, their wishes, and their dreams? For they are all that we have, all that we are and all that we will ever be."Then congratulations, Jack Frost - for you are now and forevermore...a Guardian.Yippa!Klasno!Time to go.Hyah!
